Rideable.RidingHeight.name: Riding Height
Rideable.RidingHeight.descrp: The z-height which a riding token has compared to its mount (recommended to be above 0)
Rideable.MountingDistance.name: Mounting distance
Rideable.MountingDistance.descrp: The maximum distance a token can have to its mounting target (-1 for an unlimited range)
Rideable.BorderDistance.name: Border to border distance
Rideable.BorderDistance.descrp: If the mounting distance should be calculated from the tokens border instead of the middle point (only works correctly for circular/square tokens)
Rideable.MaxRiders.name: Maximum riders per token
Rideable.MaxRiders.descrp: The maximum amount of tokens, a token can be ridden by (-1 for unlimited)
Rideable.RiderMovement.name: Rider movement
Rideable.RiderMovement.descrp: What should happen if a riding token tries to move on its own
Rideable.RidingSystemEffects.name: Apply "Mounted" effect
Rideable.RidingSystemEffects.descrp: If a token starts riding, a system dependent effect will be applied to the token (only works if the game system has a known "Mounted" effect. Compatible systems: Pf2e)
Rideable.RideableTag.name: Mounts require "Rideable" trait
Rideable.RideableTag.descrp: Allows only tokens which have the 'Rideable' trait to be ridden (the "Rideable" trait has to be manually added under settings>Pathfinder 2nd Edition>Manage Honebrew Elements>Creature Traits)
Rideable.FamiliarRiding.name: Familiar riding
Rideable.FamiliarRiding.descrp: Allows for familiars to ride their master, the familairs will be placed at the corners of their master
Rideable.PreventEnemyRiding.name: Prevent enemy riding
Rideable.PreventEnemyRiding.descrp: Stops tokens from riding enemy tokens (GMs can still override this)
Rideable.MessagePopUps.name: Message popups
Rideable.MessagePopUps.descrp: Enables multible popups upon actions such as mounting or dismounting
Rideable.Mount.name: Mount
Rideable.Mount.descrp: Mount controlled Tokens to targeted Token (alternative Macro: "Mount")
Rideable.UnMount.name: Unmount
Rideable.UnMount.descrp: Unmount controlled Tokens from their ridden Token, or unmount targeted Token from controlled Token (alternative Macro: "Unmount")
Rideable.MountFamiliar.name: Mount familiar
Rideable.MountFamiliar.descrp: Mount controlled familiars to targeted Token if targeted Token is master(alternative Macro: "MountFamiliar") (only if setting "Familiar riding" is activated)
